name: Abugalypse (PNam19)
description:
A mental breakdown (also known as a nervous breakdown) is an acute, time-limited mental disorder that manifests primarily as severe stress-induced depression, anxiety, or dissociation in a previously functional individual, to the extent that they are no longer able to function on a day-to-day basis until the disorder is resolved.

Sometimes this occurs to programmers.

Abugalypse is a cooperative multiplayer survival game for up to 4 players. Take on the role of a programmer trying to remove bugs from their game, and work with other programmers to make sure that nobody goes insane - which won't be easy!

Dev Team:

Bo Sejer La Cour

Christopher Nelson

Frederik Schmidt Knudsen

Malte Hølledig

Praveen Namasivayam
